Sentence.sentence: Writing in the journal, the scientists describe how the storks from Germany were clearly affected by the presence of waste sites, with four out of six birds that survived for at least five months overwintering on rubbish dumps in northern Morocco, instead of migrating to the Sahel.
Sentence.come: 出自-2017年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Clearly, richer societies are able to provide environmental improvements which lie well beyond the reach of poorer communities.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: And it is clearly up to the current generation of leaders from high-emitting nations to decide whether they  want to be remembered as climate change tyrants or pioneers.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: If these investments generate huge social benefits—as they clearly do—the benefits of providing more social support for the family should be that much clearer.
Sentence.come: 出自-2010年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Alcoholism is clearly present in society today.
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: The prescription is not written clearly enough
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: They clearly saw the man who attacked them, yet they mistakenly identified an innocent person.
Sentence.come: 出自-2012年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: And at each spot, Juan worked out a way to make his point more clearly.
Sentence.come: 出自-2010年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: A few psychology journals have created incentives to increase interest in reproducible science—for example,by affixing an ‘open-data' badge to articles that clearly state where data are available.
Sentence.come: 2017年12月六级真题（第二套）阅读 Section B

Sentence.sentence: However, higher doses of screen time were clearly associated with lower happiness.
Sentence.come: 2019年12月六级真题（第一套）阅读 Section B

Sentence.sentence: I like how the book is clearly written with each chapter brought to life by pieces of fascinating knowledge.
Sentence.come: 2018年12月六级真题（第二套）听力 Section A

Sentence.sentence: The Wallaces, both children of church ministers, had a clearly defined formula for their "little magazine", as Reader's digest was originally subtitled.
Sentence.come: 2018年6月六级真题（第一套）听力 Section C

Sentence.sentence: Writing in the journal, the scientists describe how the storks from Germany were clearly affected by the presence of waste sites, with four out of six birds that survived for at least five months overwintering on rubbish dumps in northern Morocco, instead
Sentence.come: 2017年6月六级真题（第三套）阅读 Section C

Sentence.sentence: A team of researchers trained three rhesus monkeys to associate 26 clearly different symbols consisting of numbers and selective letters with 0-25 drops of water or juice as a reward.
Sentence.come: 2019年高考英语全国卷3 阅读理解 阅读D 原文

Sentence.sentence: An hour later, I woke up suddenly with the solution clearly in mind.
Sentence.come: 2016年高考英语天津卷 阅读理解 阅读D 原文

Sentence.sentence: But when Dennis Williams received a text that clearly wasn't intended for him, he did something special.
Sentence.come: 2018年高考英语全国卷3 完形填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: It clearly showed that while likability can lead to healthy adjustment, high status has just the opposite effect on us.
Sentence.come: 2019年高考英语全国卷I 阅读理解 阅读D 原文

Sentence.sentence: It is likely that babies are not born knowing the basic fact of the universe; nor are they ever clearly taught it.
Sentence.come: 2016年高考英语浙江卷（6月） 阅读理解 阅读C 原文

Sentence.sentence: Not everyone knows clearly how to build personal savings, but a savings plan started on a website has helped many put away a nice tidy sum.
Sentence.come: 2016年高考英语上海卷 听力 原文

Sentence.sentence: The world may be more clearly explained through children's play.
Sentence.come: 2016年高考英语浙江卷（6月） 阅读理解 阅读C 选项

Sentence.sentence: Those words made me see clearly that when I had fallen short in the past, it was seldom because I had tried and failed.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语天津卷 阅读理解 阅读D 原文

Sentence.sentence: TV Ears has helped thousands of people with various degrees of hearing loss hear the television clearly without turning up the volume.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语北京卷 阅读理解 阅读B 原文

Sentence.sentence: All in all, this clearly seems to be a market in which big retailers could profitably apply their gigantic scale, existing infrastructure, and proven skills in the management of product ranges, logistics, and marketing intelligence.
Sentence.come: 出自-2010年考研阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: How does your reading proceed? Clearly you try to comprehend, in the sense of identifying meanings for individual words and working out relationships between them, drawing on your explicit knowledge of English grammar ( ' , 41) you begin to infer a context for the text, for insta4ce, by making decisions about what kind of speech event is involved: who is making the utterance, to whom, when and where.
Sentence.come: 出自-2015年考研阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: The newly revised Danish Fashion Ethical Charter clearly states: “We are aware of and take responsibility for the impact the fashion industry has on body ideals, especially on young people”.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年考研阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Clearly you try to comprehend, in the sense of identifying meanings for individual words and working out relationships between them, drawing on your implicit knowledge of English grammar.
Sentence.come: 2015年考研真题（英语一）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

Sentence.sentence: Readers of Happy Money are clearly a privileged lot, anxious about fulfillment, not hunger.
Sentence.come: 2014年考研真题（英语二）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

Sentence.sentence: The newly revised Danish Fashion Ethical Charter clearly states: "We are aware of and take responsibility for the impact the fashion industry has on body ideals, especially on young people".
Sentence.come: 2016年考研真题（英语一）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

sentences.en: a clearly defined role within the group
sentences.cn: 团体中明确规定的职责

sentences.en: Duff explained his meaning shortly but clearly.
sentences.cn: 达夫简短但清楚地解释了他的意思。

sentences.en: Becky could still recall that first meeting clearly.
sentences.cn: 贝姬还能清晰地记起初次见面的情景。

sentences.en: An aerial photograph of the field shows clearly where the buildings were.
sentences.cn: 这一场地的空中照片清晰地显示出这些建筑物的位置。

sentences.en: Females and cubs clearly derive some benefit from living in groups.
sentences.cn: 雌兽与幼崽显然受益于群居。

sentences.en: All this talk of a strike has clearly ruffled the management’s feathers.
sentences.cn: 所有这些关于罢工的闲言碎语显然让管理层很不高兴。

sentences.en: Defenders of the death penalty clearly regard it as the ultimate deterrent.
sentences.cn: 支持死刑的人显然认为死刑是最具威慑力的刑罚。

sentences.en: An explanation is clearly called for.
sentences.cn: 这里无疑需要一个解释。</seg>

sentence.cn: 这些话使我清楚地看到，当我过去失败时，很少因为我曾尝试过并失败了。
sentence.en: Those words made me see clearly that when I had fallen short in the past,  it was seldom because I had tried and failed.
sentence.from: 2015年高考英语天津卷 阅读理解 阅读D 原文

entry.def: Something that is clear is easy to understand, see, or hear.

example.ex: The book is clear, readable and adequately illustrated...
example.tran: 这本书明白易懂，可读性强，插图丰富。

example.ex: The space telescope has taken the clearest pictures ever of Pluto...
example.tran: 太空望远镜拍摄到了迄今为止最清晰的冥王星的照片。

entry.def: Something that is clear is obvious and impossible to be mistaken about.
entry.tran: 明显的;显然的;明白无误的

example.ex: It was a clear case of homicide...
example.tran: 这显然是一宗杀人案。

example.ex: The clear message of the scientific reports is that there should be a drastic cut in car use...
example.tran: 那些科学报告清清楚楚地告诉人们应该大幅削减汽车使用量。

entry.def: If you are clear about something, you understand it completely.
entry.tran: 完全了解的;明白的;清楚的

example.ex: It is important to be clear about what Chomsky is doing here...
example.tran: 很有必要搞清乔姆斯基在这儿干什么。

example.ex: He is not entirely clear on how he will go about it...
example.tran: 他还没完全搞清楚该如何处理这件事。

entry.def: If your mind or your way of thinking is clear, you are able to think sensibly and reasonably, and you are not affected by confusion or by a drug such as alcohol.
entry.tran: (头脑或思路)清楚的，清晰的，清醒的，不糊涂的

example.ex: She needed a clear head to carry out her instructions.
example.tran: 她需要一个头脑清醒的人来执行自己的指令。

entry.def: To clear your mind or your head means to free it from confused thoughts or from the effects of a drug such as alcohol.

example.ex: He walked up Fifth Avenue to clear his head...
example.tran: 他沿着第五大道走了走，好让大脑清醒清醒。

example.ex: Our therapists will show you how to clear your mind of worries.
example.tran: 我们的治疗师会教你如何消除心中的忧虑。

entry.def: A clear substance is one which you can see through and which has no colour, like clean water.

example.ex: ...a clear glass panel...
example.tran: 透明的玻璃板

example.ex: ...a clear gel...
example.tran: 透明的凝胶

entry.def: A clear colour is bright and strong.

example.ex: He has clear blue eyes and a dazzling smile.
example.tran: 他有一双明亮的蓝眼睛和一脸灿烂的微笑。

entry.def: If a surface, place, or view is clear, it is free of unwanted objects or obstacles.
entry.tran: (表面)收拾干净的;(地方)畅通的;(视野)无阻碍的

example.ex: The runway is clear — go ahead and land...
example.tran: 跑道畅通无阻，开始着陆吧。

example.ex: All exits must be kept clear in case of fire or a bomb scare...
example.tran: 所有出口必须保持畅通，以防有火灾或炸弹威吓发生。

entry.def: When you clear an area or place or clear something from it, you remove things from it that you do not want to be there.

example.ex: To clear the land and harvest the bananas they decided they needed a male workforce...
example.tran: 为了清理那片地和收割香蕉，他们决定雇请男劳力。

example.ex: Stewart was trying to clear a path for the stretcher...
example.tran: 斯图尔特在努力给担架开路。

entry.def: If something or someone clears the way or the path for something to happen, they make it possible.

example.ex: The Prime Minister resigned today, clearing the way for the formation of a new government...
example.tran: 首相今天的辞职为新政府的组建扫清了道路。

example.ex: A court in Berlin has dropped the charges against him, clearing the way for him to leave Germany.
example.tran: 柏林的一个法庭今天撤销了对他的指控，这样他就可以离开德国了。

entry.def: If it is a clear day or if the sky is clear, there is no mist, rain, or cloud.

example.ex: On a clear day you can see the French coast...
example.tran: 天气晴朗时可以望见法国海岸。

example.ex: The winter sky was clear.
example.tran: 冬天的天空万里无云。

entry.def: When fog or mist clears, it gradually disappears.

example.ex: The early morning mist had cleared.
example.tran: 晨雾散去了。

entry.def: Clear eyes look healthy, attractive, and shining.

example.ex: ...clear blue eyes...
example.tran: 清澈的蓝眼睛

example.ex: Her eyes were clear and steady.
example.tran: 她的眼神清澈而坚定。

entry.def: If your skin is clear, it is healthy and free from spots.
If you say that your conscience is clear, you mean you do not think you have done anything wrong.

example.ex: Mr Garcia said his conscience was clear over the jail incidents...
example.tran: 加西亚先生说他对监狱中发生的事件问心无愧。

example.ex: I can look back on things with a clear conscience. I did everything I could.
example.tran: 我可以问心无愧地回首过去，我已经尽力了。

entry.def: If something or someone is clear of something else, it is not touching it or is a safe distance away from it.
entry.tran: 不接触的;远离的;在安全距离以外的

example.ex: As soon as he was clear of the terminal building he looked round...
example.tran: 他一离开机场大楼，就环顾了一下四周。

example.ex: She placed a towel on a cluster of rocks just clear of the tidemark...
example.tran: 她把一条毛巾放在刚没过涨潮线的一堆石头上。

entry.def: If you drive clear to a place, especially a place that is far away, you go all the way there without delays.

example.ex: After that they drove clear over to St Paul.
example.tran: 之后，他们一口气开到圣保罗。

entry.def: If an animal or person clears an object or clears a certain height, they jump over the object, or over something that height, without touching it.

example.ex: Sotomayor, the Cuban holder of the world high jump record, cleared 2.36 metres.
example.tran: 古巴的世界跳高纪录保持者索托马约尔跳过了2.36米。

entry.def: When a bank clears a cheque or when a cheque clears, the bank agrees to pay the sum of money mentioned on it.

example.ex: Polish banks can still take two or three weeks to clear a cheque...
example.tran: 在波兰，银行兑现支票可能还需要两三个星期。

example.ex: Allow time for the cheque to clear.
example.tran: 留出时间兑现支票。

entry.def: If a course of action is cleared, people in authority give permission for it to happen.

example.ex: Linda Gradstein has this report from Jerusalem, which was cleared by an Israeli censor...
example.tran: 琳达·格拉德斯坦的这份报道来自耶路撒冷，它已经通过了以色列方面的审查。

example.ex: Within an hour, the helicopter was cleared for take-off...
example.tran: 不到一个小时，直升机获准起飞。

entry.def: If someone is cleared, they are proved to be not guilty of a crime or mistake.

example.ex: She was cleared of murder and jailed for just five years for manslaughter...
example.tran: 她被判谋杀罪名不成立，仅以过失杀人罪判处5年监禁。

example.ex: In a final effort to clear her name, Eunice has written a book.
example.tran: 尤妮斯写了本书,最后一次试图证明自己的清白。

entry.def: You can say 'Is that clear?' or 'Do I make myself clear?' after you have told someone your wishes or instructions, to make sure that they have understood you, and to emphasize your authority.
entry.tran: (用于确定自己的话被理解以及强调权威性)听懂了吗？我说明白了吗？

example.ex: We're only going for half an hour, and you're not going to buy anything. Is that clear?
example.tran: 我们只去半个小时，而且你什么都不能买。听清楚了没有？

entry.def: If someone is in the clear, they are not in danger, or are not blamed or suspected of anything.
entry.tran: 没有危险的;不受责备的;不受怀疑的

example.ex: The Audit Commission said that the ministry was in the clear.
example.tran: 审计署称该政府部门没有问题。

entry.def: If you make something clear, you say something in a way that makes it impossible for there to be any doubt about your meaning, wishes, or intentions.

example.ex: Mr O'Friel made it clear that further insults of this kind would not be tolerated...
example.tran: 奥弗里尔先生明确表示，绝不容忍这样的侮辱行为再次发生。

example.ex: The far-right has now made its intentions clear.
example.tran: 极右势力已经清楚地表明了其意图。

entry.def: If something or someone is a certain amount clear of a competitor, they are that amount ahead of them in a competition or race.
entry.tran: 高出，超出，多出（竞争对手）

example.ex: Keegan's team are now seven points clear of West Ham...
example.tran: 基冈率领的球队现在领先西汉姆联队7分。

example.ex: He crossed the line three seconds clear of Tom Snape.
example.tran: 他领先汤姆·斯内普3秒冲过终点线。

entry.def: If you steer clear or stay clear of someone or something, you avoid them.

example.ex: The rabbis try to steer clear of political questions.
example.tran: 拉比们努力避开政治问题。

sentences.sentence: "history has clearly shown the folly of that policy"
"the foreigner spoke to us quite intelligibly"

means.word_mean: 3. clear to the mind; with distinct mental discernment;

sentences.sentence: "I could clearly see myself in his situation"
"could be seen clearly under the microscope"

sentences.cn: 这本书明白易懂，可读性强，插图丰富。

sentences.cn: 很有必要搞清乔姆斯基在这儿干什么。
sentences.en: It is important to be clear about what Chomsky is doing here...

sentences.cn: 月亮明亮地照耀着,月光皎洁.
sentences.en: The moon shone clearly.

sentences.cn: 这样,为什么人的问题他们就还是没有解决, 或者没有明确地解决.
sentences.en: Thus they have not yet solved, or not yet clearly solved, the problem of " for whom? "

sentences.cn: 引发这个错误的断言完成状态值将在错误文本中被明确地指明.
sentences.en: The completion status that caused the problem will be clearly indicated in the error text.

sentences.cn: 你可以决定你要选择什么主题,只要它很明确地与课程的内容有关.
sentences.en: The choice the topic is up to you as it clearly pertains to the course material.

sentences.cn: 最后, 作者让她死在自己的枪口之下, 明确地表示了否定的态度.
sentences.en: End, the author lets her die under own gun muzzle, meaning a negative attitude clearly.

sentences.cn: 发布的最新指南则比以往更明确地说明了应该如何服用阿司匹林.
sentences.en: Preventive Services Task Force say much more clearly than before when aspirin should be administered.

sentences.cn: 你可以决定你要选择什麽主题,只要它很明确地与课程的内容有关.
sentences.en: The choice the topic is to you as it clearly pertains to the course material.

sentences.cn: 引发这个错误的原因将在错误文本中被明确地指明.
sentences.en: The error text will clearly indicate the nature of the problem.

sentences.cn: 引发验证错误的键值对将在错误文本中被明确地指明.
sentences.en: The error text will clearly indicate the key and value combination that failed validation.

sentences.cn: 他大声明确地说出自己的想法。
sentences.en: He asserted his ideas loudly and clearly.

sentences.cn: 共和党在这一事变中的政策始终没有明确地解释过.
sentences.en: The Republican policy throughout the incident was never clearly explained.

sentences.cn: 女士们需要的是将这些要求明确地说出来.
sentences.en: Women need to communicate this more clearly.

sentences.cn: 年轻人明确地支持他们本人是否吸烟的问题.
sentences.en: Young people clearly support this, whether they themselves smoke or not.

sentences.cn: 以上叙述明确地表达了一个很重要的功能.
sentences.en: The above description clearly denotes an extremely important function.

sentences.cn: 消息的上限将在错误文本中被明确地指明.
sentences.en: The upper limit will be clearly indicated in the error text.

sentences.cn: 每个set实现应该明确地记录对其可能包含元素的所有限制.
sentences.en: Individual set implementations should clearly document any restrictions on the elements that they may contain.

sentences.cn: 不喜欢她, 要明确地告诉她.免得拖泥带水的动摇你的意志.
sentences.en: If you dislike her, please tell her clearly about the bush, your will will be changed.

sentences.cn: 引发这个问题的原因将在错误文本(errInfo) 中被明确地指明.
sentences.en: The errInfo text will clearly indicate the problem.

sentences.cn: 这是个很好的分析方法,可以让我们明确地将焦点放在游戏性上.
sentences.en: This is a good method of analysis since it allows us to focus clearly on gameplay.

sentences.cn: 在当前这样的时候, 我们必须迅速而明确地交换意见.
sentences.en: At times like this, we must communicate quickly and clearly.

sentences.cn: 诚然,巴霍芬并没有这样明确地表述这些论点,(他的神秘主义的观点妨碍他这样做).
sentences.en: Bachofen did not put these statements as clearly asfor he was hindered his mysticism.

sentences.cn: 只有等到第二峰或第二底形成后才能明确地下结论.
sentences.en: We can clearly make a conclusion until the second wave crest or wave trough is formed.

sentences.cn: 数学如同音乐或诗一样显然地确实具有美学价值.
sentences.en: Mathematics possesses an aesthetic value as clearly defined as that of music or poetry.

sentences.cn: 他显然地对他的衰弱样子或是太过于安静感到害怕.
sentences.en: He was clearly terrified of appearing weak or of being too quiet.

sentences.cn: 显然地,一个学习复杂事物的方法快速地传播开来.
sentences.en: Clearly a learning process of great complexity at a rapid rate.

Sentence.sentence: Caregivers must also learn to state their needs and opinions clearly and ask for help from others especially brothers and sisters.
